creator: Syretia
text:
- Arch variants are not supported on this server.
- Most distros based on Arch add unofficial repositories, ship customized software that breaks, or make bad design decisions in general.
- This includes any install scripts.
- If you want the benefits of Arch, install the [official version](https://www.archlinux.org/download/) using the [official installation guide](https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Installation_guide).

See <div emoji="`{prefix}info arch`" style="display:none;"/>[Arch Linux](#arch-linux) for more information about Arch Linux.

See <div emoji="`{prefix}info rolling`" style="display:none;"/>[Rolling Releases](#rolling-releases) for more information about rolling releases.
